values: Im moving to Pelam...I probly wont get to see my friends much if ever. But I will be coming to stay with my dad more often. And if Dawn gets bitchy then I can go to Sica's. Who knows though. I love you all.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME
I WANT A SUGAR COOKIE
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME

seriously people. i want a god damn sugar cookie. GIVE ME A COOKIE!!!

my grampa sent me 50 bucks. yay. now ill be able to afford smokes since someone *coughdrewcough* keeps bumming all mine. oh...and i can get some more cds...Tilt. Beware.

So my aunt threw a birthday party for this girl Skola last night and it was also jam night. In other words, great live music, lots of chips, and lots of booze. Pretty much hung out with these three actors the entire time. Shannon, Grey, and Chuckle Slut. Cant remember his real name...One of the two keyboard players, the new one, got so drunk and I got to take care of him all night. Someone had dragged him into the woods...so Grey, myself, and keyboard guy number one, Brad, had to drag him up to the deck. They sent me to get pillows, and water, and cool towels for the poor guy. Shannon said, "Okay, heres your lesson for the night. Party like this," and he gestures to all the musicians and actors, "not like this," and pointed to the keyboard guy. And I ended up changing my shirt three times. Its crazyness. This one girl, whos name I do not remember, said to the guys, "We need to sneak her more booze." She knew how old I am. So after they passed a flask to me a few times, they asked how old I was. They all turned around and put their heads in their hands. It was awesome. All in all though, it was a good night. Even though I did have to take care of a puking drunk from 12:30 to 3:10.

So...I have to be at the airport around 7 tomorrow morning. So I am getting up early. My flight leaves at 9...bout and hour and a half on one plane...i cant remember how long it takes...an hour layover...and then about 30 minutes to an hour on another plane. Fun. I. Hate. Heights. I have a window seat. Ack...God damnit...won't be able to talk to Drew for a week...might be able to talk to Sica. At least through e-mail. Dunno his e-mail though...hmmm...I wont be back till next Saturday, so perhaps I will see some of you fools then. Love you all. Wish me luck on my flight.

In a world where nothing is perfect. In a world where the sky is the sea. A girl that looks like a china doll. Is waiting for you and for me. She caresses my face, runs her hands down my body. Kisses me sweetly and loves me til the end and beyond. Hands roaming. Her soul is so fufilling...All I want is her in my arms. But he is so possesing. Filling me completely. nothing matters but the pleasure.  His touch is all around me. Surrounding. Completing. A cigarette is all I need now. What will come in the end? Who will be there in the end? All I want is love. I need both of them. Who will I choose? The woman or the man? Oh darling...who will I choose?

Im grounded again. This time for the sake of being grounded. Sica was right. She just looks for an excuse to punish me. I think I'll just try and move in with my dad. That would probably be best. Even though he hates how I dress...
Sica, tell Drew not to call. It just makes my mom even more angry. And makes me want to cry cause I cant talk to him. And if I cry, I cant go to Austin. Hopefully I'll get to move in with dad, or at least be at his house Wednesday so I can go to the zoo. But I dont have any money...so find someone to pay for me. Okay? I love you all.

My little china doll was sitting on a couch in a run-down appartment. This perfect, presteen girl had a beer in one hand and a cigarette in the other. Imperfections were swarming all around her, smothering her like locusts. She watched these people-people in name only-drink and smoke, living as if it was their last day on Earth. She watched these "people," hoping to find one of them that was her complete opposite. Boys and girls went by, until she finally found her prey. A girl, of maybe sixteen. She was chubby with freckles across her face. Her rainbow shoelaces said it all. My china doll threw down her beer, took her hand, and led her to an empty bedroom. Not saying a word. She found an imperfection. That could make her real. At long last.

I have finally been allowed back into my house without any threats of being sent back to the hospital. Let me explain.

Monday morning, my mother and I got into a huge fight. I, being the pussy I am, started crying. She decided I should go to the hospital. She called my dad and tried to get him to take me there because she had a ten o'clock appointment. Instead, he picked me up and took me to work with him. Later that day I went and got some clothes. I spent the night at my grandfather's because my dad and my stepmom got into a fight over me. The next morning, my mom called and said she was going to come and get me. So I called my dad. Of course, she was planning on taking me to the hospital. He talked her out of coming to get me. (she had also called Sica to see if I had been cutting, which I had not been) That night, I stayed at my dads. He let me go spend the day with Sica Wednesday because I had nothing to do at his house. We ended up going to see Fantastic Four which didn't suck. Then back to dad's. Mommy Dearest was still wanting me to go to the hospital. Stayed another night there. One of my contacts had fallen out so I called dad to see if I could run by mom's to get another one. He said just pack up my shit and go. So, called mom, asked if I was allowed back in the house. She asked if I had a key. So, here I am. I don't know if she is still set on putting me back in Children's psych ward or not...but it's all okay. Because I have people who care about me enough to come pick me up and prevent that from happening. My dad only did it because:
1. He doesn't think she should throw me in there because we got in a fight
2. He doesn't want to pay for it

So I've had a shitty week, really. So excuse me if I am rude.

She looks like a little china doll. Everthing about her is graceful and perfect. Leaning against a brick wall. Downtown. A cigarette to her lips. Filter covered in her lipstick. Shes dying inside. A thought comes to her. Where has the time gone? Has it been three days or four? Since shes been home. But she doesnt have a home, really. It is the street, the river, the air. She resides there on the good days. On the bad. Where has the time gone? She moves like the wind. Looking for a fix. She wanders the streets in search of a stranger. One who can make her feel alive. For one last time.

OHG!! Drew...took me out...in PUBLIC!! AHHH!! So..Myles arrived with Scott and Drew around oh..6:30. We had to wait til my mom got home to leave cause she wanted to meet them. Who knows why. But eventually we left and stopped by Myles' house. They tried to make me hold fireworks in my mouth and light them. I wouldnt let them of course. Then off to MOES!! Everyone decided to climb out the sunroof...I would have but I was wearing my kilt...so that was out of the question for me. Once we were sitting in a booth with our food I pulled out the camera and made a video or two of Drew and Scott..and Sica when she pulled out a spork and made it a BAT SPORK! I wish I could upload it here but I dunno how. Anyway...Sica started trying to stab people and I got a spork and Drew broke it so I stabbed him with it...then nachos were thrown...people were staring...I was afraid we were going to be kicked out. But we werent, which is good. We walked around a bit...went and looked at the pets at Pet Smart. When we came out...THERE WAS ASS!!! I havent seen Ass since I was at DABBS. And I most definatly got his number.
Stale incense and old sweat And LIES LIES LIES It comes down to this Your kiss Your fist And strange, it gets under my skin
Then we decided to cross the busy intersection rather than wait for Myles. And coming down the hill behind the movie theatre Scott tripped and fell and went SPLAT on the concret. I laughed. He got up like...three seconds later though. Crazy fool...Then they paid for our tickets (Sica and I got to keep all our money..hehe..such gentlemen..) Sica and Scott made a detor to the bathroom so Drew and I decided to hide in the theatre...It actually took them a while to find us...we were down low in the seats. I love me. Myles came in during the previews. Just appeared out of no where. Watched War of the Worlds. It was pretty good...cept for you know...TOM CRUISE!! I hate him...grr...Anyway. We got Myles to take us back to my house after the movie. It was crazy in the car...holy shit...I thought we were going to die. Ask one of us for more details. Stopped by Sica's, picked up a few DVDs...Then we came here. And watched the Led Zeppelin DVD that she had. And it was good. They (Scott and Sica) tried to smother me with a pillow..then they dumped glitter on Drew's back and in his hair..assholes... They left around 12:45. Sadness...I didnt want Drew to leave...and Sica didnt want Scott to leave. But at least Sica got a goodnight kiss.

On July 5, 2005 at 4:17 am Shannon actually said, "I'm proud of you."

HOLY SHITE MUSLIM! I cannot believe it. That is the nicest thing that has ever come out of her mouth. I'll explain later.

My 4th started out kinda sucky...mommy dearest was making me clean up the house...(I'm lazy, what can I say?) But then Taylor calls and asks if she can bum (actually buy but she never pays me...dunno why I supply her...) a pack of cigarette. So I tell my mom she wants to get a cd that she can listen to on her way to her grandmother's. And she says "why dont you just go with her?" So I asked Tay if she wanted me to come and she said yeah. So off we went with two unopened packs of cigarettes to her grandmothers. Nothing much happened there. Least not anything of any importance or amusement.
After we got back we went to Johnathon's to see how many fireworks we had. We decided we need more Roman Candles and bottle rockets. Bombs, you know the drill. So Tay and I went and spent $20 on more fireworks. Then back to Johnathon's to pick up him and the rest of the explosives and we headed to Shannon's. We made a mini mushroom cloud on her porch and then a bigger one on the street. And of course they shot fireworks at me...cause I suck I guess...I dunno...Then Drew, Scott, Chip, and Katie showed up. Thats when the real fun began. So many pretty colors...
Well...Katie and Chip left...and then Tay had to go home to shoot fireworks with the kids so we changed locations. After shooting with the kids at Penguin's we went down the street to Tay's and started making our big bomb. I hit Drew in the side with a metal pole to avenge Scott for his wrist. Then I spared Drew and then Scott. Lot of little shit happened and something big that doesn't concern any of you...Then Myles showed up. We lit the big bomb, pissed off some neighbors...Fun fun man.
Then back to Shannon's. Johnathon, Taylor, and Penguin left at this point. We couldn't play with any more fireworks at Shannon's either because of people calling and complaining...so we went swimming instead. And some point during our excursion in the pool...Drew asked me out...w00t. It was great...and of course those other fools we all fighting...crazy mother fuckers...Anyway, they left around 4 am.
Once Shannon and I were in her room, She said she was proud of me and was glad that Drew and I were going out. That I did good for once. Cause Drew's a good guy...yeah. I am still shocked.

<center>I'll be quiet to keep you quiet
Don't concern yourself with my slow dying
Through the fence I hear you sigh
I dont get too high these days
Your floor is my ceiling
Lights out you can't come in
If you don't remind me I won't forget you
If you don't ask I won't upset you</center>

I got a message from Jen today. It said, "amanda if you like guys so much why do you call yourself bi or gay?" It's like...honey, do you know why bi means? I LIKE BOTH!! Oi...why is she being so bitchy?

Rhiannon has mono...poor thing. I called her today...and she most definitely made out with Eryn. Oh muh gods...thats crAZy..My friends...they are so strange. They say that they're straight and then LOOK AT EM!! Freaks...

Got back from Florida on Friday around 6:30. Was an altogether shitty trip. By the way, I hate Garth Brooks. And that country christian "music." Bill was playing that shit the entire time we were there and in transit to and from Santa Rosa beach. My batteries ran out...several times...had to make them stop and get some out of the back of the truck. I refused to go to the beach. I hate sun...I am WAY too pale to be on the beach for hours. Not to mention that there were two shark attacks while we were there. A girl was killed and a little boy got his leg bitten off. Fun. Went to some neat shops though...like Purple Haze and Vans Shoes. Hahaha... Led Zeppelin shirt and some new shoes. YAY!! Now I need some shoestrings. Hmm...

<center>Sitting in Queens - Eating refried beens
Wearing all my magazines - Gulping down thorazines</center>

Trying to find something to do for the 4th. Might go party with Spencer...might go blow things up at Taylor's house...But I think Im just going to wait and find out what Scott and Drew are doing. Cause they might be doing something with my beloved theatre people. Whos numbers....I have lost...I lose everything, seriously. Been looking for my wallet for months.

Well. Everyone will be GLAD to know, I have officially given up on Taylor. Its just not worth the trouble and fights. So...Im probably going to ask a certain guy out soon...if he doesnt do it first. Im giving him one more week. The only reason he hasnt done it yet is because hes uncertain if he should or not because of...Taylor. Of course. So few know who I am talking about. Yay. So surprised you all shall be.

I WANT SUGAR COOKIES!!

Is the reason that Will and I fight really because of Tay like she says it is? He cant be mad because I want her...hell, he's turned me down countless times. He has no place to be angry. Who fucking knows, man...I know I dont. He's just being an asshole as usual. Actually, I take that back. Usually he is really sweet. Meh...

<center>Loneliness is the human condition.</center>

Mommy Dearest said that she was going to get me a digital camera before we go to Florida. Yay. I hope I get to pick it out. IM MISSING THE SIMPSONS!! NOOOO!! I am finally going to be able to have pictures of all of my friends. Ill put the more embarrassing ones on here. Im sorry, Shannon, but people are going to see pics of us raping you. HAHA!! Dont worry, folks, we just grope her and give her hickies.

<center> Theres a smile when the pain comes.
The pain's going to make everything alright.</center>

<center>"Im living in heaven yet I feel like Im in hell."</center>

I dont know what to do about her...I really dont...She wont even talk to me, really...Upsets me a touch. But I cried last night...no more tears will be shed over her. I swear it. I wish I was more like Sica...shes so apathetic. I dont want to care anymore. Gods I need a cigarette...just thinking of her...She just signed off..not bothering to IM me...she always IMs me...

Someone sent me a message on Yahoo from my ghost's screenname. It scared the piss out of me. I didnt even read it, I just closed it out. You know who my ghost is...sweet thing...

<center>She paints her nails black as night now. Pulls those shades down tight.."</center>

But anyway...got a Bob Marley shirt at City Stages sunday. Thanks, dad. Then I come home and get in a fight with Tay. Fun. But Sica came over today. She helped cheer me up quite a bit. Helped her out with her boy troubles. Cause Im just good like that. He should be calling her in the next couple of days...then maybe shell be happy. Hmm...

Hannah, Nikki, Taylor, Hannah, Nikki, Taylor...Cant have the one I want...The other two want me...One of them has a car...One actually cares about me...Ugh...fuck it. Im just staying single. I am the new Shane. Oh yeah, baby.

All I want is a kiss...haha...

The Butlerian Jihad makes me happy. Its one of the prequels to Dune. w00t. 

So...Shannon-kun and I didnt get to go to Litha today...our ride got sick. DAMNIT!! I wanted to go sooooo bad...Son of a biotch...Just got back maybe, oh, an hour ago, from getting my dad a fathers day present. Got him a cheap ass pocket knife. Fuuuuuuuun...I have to make him a card later, though. Dont really feel like it...but mommy dearest is making me.


<center>Been dazed and confused so long its not true
Wanted a woman never bargained for you
Lots of people talk and few of them know
Soul of a woman was created below</center>


My goddess that girl makes me angry...I love her, yes, but she infuriates me so fucking much...I hate it man...How would she feel if I always talked about Will? At least I have the courtesy...But Im going to give us another try...the Crone suggested it...and she always knows best...Now to actually get in touch with her and tell her...These two other chicks will be quite upset though. One more so than the other. Oh well...meh...what can you do?

BTW, Brad, I fucking hate you. WHY THE HELL DID YOU BITE ME?! THERE ARE MARKS!! AND THEY HURT!! grrr....

WOO HOO!! Samurai Champloo is on!! Yay. I love this show. One of the main guys (whos name I cant remember) looks a lot like Spike from Cowboy Bebop. The music is really cool, too. I should download some of it...yes...this is good.

My nails are blue.


~~rabbit~~

SOWING MACHINES ARE BASTARDS!!!

It took forever for my pimpette to get my sowing machine all ready to sew. I need new pants. I dont have all the time in the world...

I need rainbow or black suspenders. Or both. I have white and grey ones and green "Kiss me Im Irish" ones, but no black. OR rainbow. Damnit. I need to go to the thrift store. Perhaps they shall have some. I do hope so. Else Ill have to find those bitches on E-bay. DAMN YOU E-BAY!

<center>This aint the way its supposed to be
Theres a dark cloud following me
Im disillusioned
And Im down on the world again</center>

I am going to make Drew an American punk shirt. How I love wifebeaters, paint, and sissors. Oh muh goddess. Im thinkin an American flag wraped around it and a big anarchy a spraypainted on the front, and on the back, a WHOLE bunch of lyrics from different punk bands. Yes...I dunno if he likes the same ones that I do so Ill have him supply the lyrics. Indeed.

I...have a girlfriend now...such a pretty girl...I dont know how long itll last though...we are ALWAYS fighting. Because, well, I suck. I do and say stupid shit. What can ya do?

<center>Loving over and over again now
It aint nothing girl till youve felt the pain
Up against the wall Why does love always have to hurt
Your scratched run across my back and then a tear</center>

I need to find my Tilt cds...Damnit.

I NEED FRIENDS!! *cries*

~~rabbit~~

People are strange. They say one thing and mean another. Bastards...I mean, what? I wish I could just turn into a cat or something. Then I wouldnt have to deal with all the bullshit. I could just sleep and eat and be petted. Yes...But sadly that will never happen so I am screwed. 

<center>"sing it to the tune of FAGGOT FAGGOT FAGGOT ooh" </center>

I dont feel good...I feel so in the wrong for some reason...and I really dont know why...Ive done nothing wrong but be myself...hmmm...

<center>"dig me now, fuck me less"</center>
